content:
Call for contribution: International Forum on Digital and Democracy (IFDaD)
Caâ€™ Foscari University of Venice + Fondazione Giorgio Cini on December 10-11, 2020, Venice

The forum aims to be a meeting place between politics and academics. Jeffrey Sachs, Gianluca Misuraca, Erika Widegren, Romano Prodi and Dave Eggers are among the invited speakers.

Registration to the conference is free of charge until sold out. Travel grants with limited funding are available applying at info@ifdad.org with a cv and a motivation letter. In the case of restrictions on mass gatherings and large events or on travels, e.g. due to Covid-19, IFDaD 2020 will be held online.

IMPORTANT DATES

September 1st 2020 Submission deadline
October 10th 2020 Communication of the Accepted Paper
November 10th 2020 Camera-ready deadline

More information at https://www.ifdad.org
